player_gauff.narrative_summary: Someone who watches horror but doesn't live it

player_sabalenka.narrative_summary: Someone who has lived through actual trauma and emerged stronger

intuitive_weighting.metaphorical_battle: The one watching the horror story vs. the one living it

symbolic_alignment.justification: Exceptional alignment: 'Finals' + 'Final Destination' wordplay, horror theme resonates with player interests, opponent's real trauma creates perfect narrative contrast

belief_intensity.justification: Strong conviction in 'lived experience trumps theoretical toughness' thesis. Historical precedent supports survivors over observers in high-pressure scenarios

sentiment_intensity.justification: Pre-match interviews show Sabalenka's calm stoicism vs Gauff's nervous energy. Body language and vocal tone analysis supports narrative positioning

narrative_breathability.justification: Story feels inevitable and complete. Multiple reinforcing metaphors create strong narrative momentum

predicted_outcome.summary: The narrative strongly suggests the survivor's authentic resilience will overcome the fan's manufactured toughness in the pressure cooker of a Grand Slam final

intuitive_weighting.raw_intuition_text: Coco feels like she is in literally the 'final' destination. Sabalenka is living a real-life horror story with her losses and trauma. The one living it defeats the one watching it.

in_game_cascade.trigger_insight: Sabalenka's opening service game - immediate dominance and rhythm establishment
in_game_cascade.final_outcome: Sabalenka wins 6-3, 6-2 in straight sets, confirming initial narrative

cascade_levels.title: Initial Insight
cascade_levels.subtitle: Cascade Trigger
cascade_levels.label: Sabalenka breaks Gauff in opening game
cascade_levels.technical_details: Clean service return winners, immediate pressure application

cascade_levels.title: First Application
cascade_levels.subtitle: Obvious Play
cascade_levels.label: Gauff's double fault under pressure
cascade_levels.technical_details: Break point, crowd noise, visible tension in serving motion

cascade_levels.title: Secondary Ripple
cascade_levels.subtitle: One Level Deeper
cascade_levels.label: Crowd energy shifts from hopeful to resigned
cascade_levels.technical_details: Audible change in crowd dynamics, Gauff's body language becomes defensive

cascade_levels.title: Tertiary Cascade
cascade_levels.subtitle: Hidden Connections
cascade_levels.label: Sabalenka serves out championship with authority
cascade_levels.technical_details: Ace on championship point, celebration shows relief not surprise

unexpected_elements: Gauff showed more fight in set 2 than predicted
Sabalenka's serving was more dominant than anticipated
key_learnings: Symbolic alignment score of 9+ appears to be highly reliable
First game momentum was decisive as predicted
